title: Settlers 3 (III) 1.6.0 + Gold Edition + Mission CD + Amazons - N
description:
No more, no less.

Just Settlers III with packages provides in title/filename. Don't use s3.exe, use the xp fix instead ('s3_1.6 XP update.exe').

To play gold you should add some register settings:

Download the reg-file: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4478764" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4478764</a>

OR

Copy paste to plain text file (notepad for example), and save as somename.reg. After you've saved it, run it and let it add registry settings. Start the game using the XP update.


Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREBluebyte]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREBluebyteS3PLUSCD]
"LanguagePlus"=dword:00000009
"EditorPlus"=dword:00000001
"GameExePlus"="\S3.EXE"
"UserMapDirPlus"="\Map\User\"
"EditorPathPlus"="D:\BlueByte\Settlers3\S3Editor"
"SourceMapDirPlus"="D:\BlueByte\Settlers3\S3Editor\Source\"
"HelpPlus"="D:\BlueByte\Settlers3\S3Editor\Help\English\Index.htm"
"BrowserPlus"="D:\BlueByte\Settlers3\S3Editor\Help\IViewp32.EXE"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREBluebyteS3PLUSCD1.0]
